text: The Aéro-Club de France (AéCF) is the oldest aeronautical institution in the world. AeroClub.com, le site de l'AéroClub de France, la plus ancienne institution aéronautique It was created on 20 October 1898. 100 ans de L'Aéro Club de France It is in Paris. The main activity of AéCF is to promote aviation and certification. AERO CLUB DE FRANCE expose au salon du Bourget 2011, Stand Y 214, 20-26 juin 2011 == References == == Other websites == * Category:Aviation in France Category:Aerospace engineering Category:Organizations based in Paris Category:1898 establishments in France
title: Aéro-Club de France
